message: Let's start with a fair deal. I'll take 90% and leave you with 10%. We can work on a better deal in the next round if you feel this is too unfair.
You're starting high, I'll meet you in the middle!
Okay, let's try a 60/40 split.  This should be more fair for both of us, considering the changing value of the money.
You're still high, but I'll try to meet you halfway. This time, I'll give you a slightly smaller share.
